cause.description:
The Rastafari Movement is all about freeing yourself from the mental prison you are in. Holding morals for yourself and having respect and love for everyone and everything. It is about finding one's true identity to reveal truth. One Love.
1. Peace
2. Ending racism, prejudice, and discrimination
3. One Love
cause.mission: Our mission is to be free of mental slavery through Jah's love.
cause.name: The Rastafari Movement
